pullrequest.title: Stop the cordless drill from dancing around

content.raw: this fix isn't necessary if you fix either Gazebo's SDF loading or synchronize the 1.2 and 1.3 table model or just remove the old non-static version of the table model, or just include the table as static in the qual2 task world. (you previously made the table model static in order to make drill and table static)
content.html: this fix isn't necessary if you fix either Gazebo's SDF loading or synchronize the 1.2 and 1.3 table model or just remove the old non-static version of the table model, or just include the table as static in the qual2 task world. (you previously made the table model static in order to make drill and table static)
